title: "Alpha test is currently unavailable"
body: When i was just playing a normal blind game,I've been disconnect and when i tried to log in it say"Alpha test is currently unavailable" is this just me or is this happening to everyone else?

replies.body: was playing aram when this happened to me. did you find a solution?
This still happens to me. HELP
middle of a 5v5, lost connection, closed client, reopened, "Alpha test is currently unavailable", unable to log back in. After the last patch i began losing connection in 5v5's and aram games.
As an update, messed around long enough closing and reopening the client, then restarted comp and to no avail. Curious problem, and an annoying too.
It sounds like this may have happened when the Patch Update rolled out. Are you still experiencing this issue?

It just now happened after my comp began "attempting to reconnect" while in an ARAM game... 01/11/2017 @ now approx 0300 hours pacific time NA. I tried to exit out and log back in and this message popped up.
same with me. logged me off of ARAM and message appeared. cannot log back in
it just let me back in

Me too! I wasn't even playing. I was eating and watching planet earth, and  i logged in the client plan  to play after meal.. 
but then it just logged me out and saying Alpha test is currently unavailable....T.T
it just let me back in!

This just now happened to me... I lagged out to the point where I "attempted to reconnect" and tried to log back in and it said the same thing, " The alpha test is currently unavailable".    03:11 am Pacific time
are we gonna get the afk long queue now? :( ugh. I still can't get in
happened to me as well...waited 10mins for it to reconnect but no luck. Any solutions?
